UnableToInstall Unable to Install YouNeedToBeAnAdminUser You need to be an admin user to install Burning Crusade. ClickHereForMoreInformation Click here for more |i|nformation NewerOperatingSystem1 Burning Crusade requires a newer operating system to run. NewerOperatingSystem2 WindowsRequiredOS Windows 2000, XP or newer is required. MacOSXRequiredOS Mac OS X 10.3.9 or later is required.
WrongLocale1 This version of The Burning Crusade is only compatible with WrongLocale2 the English (US) version of World of Warcraft.
RestartRequired Restart Required YouNeedToRestart1 You need to restart your computer before YouNeedToRestart2 playing Burning Crusade.
FailedMinSpec1 Your computer fails to meet the FailedMinSpec2 minimum system requirements. NotEnoughRAM Not enough RAM (learn more) TooSlowCPU Insufficient CPU Speed (learn more) InstallAnyway |I|nstall Anyway

InstallationComplete Installation Complete! UpdateAnAccount1 If you haven't upgraded your World of Warcraft account, click the UpdateAnAccount2 button below. Your account must be upgraded to login and play. UpdateYourAccount |U|pgrade Your Account UpdateYourAccountURL http://www.worldofwarcraft.com/burningcrusade/upgrade HaveAnAccountAlready1 If your account has already been upgraded, click the button below HaveAnAccountAlready2 to launch Burning Crusade.
